2020-08-04 0.5.0 Source [SRC] [PGP] [SHA512]

发版说明

新特性

  • [TUBEMQ-122] Increase JAVA version collection of SDK environment
  • [TUBEMQ-163] Flume sink for TubeMQ
  • [TUBEMQ-197] Support TubeMQ connector for Apache Flink
  • [TUBEMQ-238] Support TubeMQ connector for Apache Spark Streaming
  • [TUBEMQ-239] support deployment on kubernetes

改进

  • [TUBEMQ-46] Correct some spelling issues
  • [TUBEMQ-53] fix some typos
  • [TUBEMQ-55] fix some typos
  • [TUBEMQ-57] fix some typos
  • [TUBEMQ-58] fix some typos
